mapper.update:
update product_order
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_quantity = #{productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product_order set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_quantity = #{productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, consignee_name = #{consigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_mobile = #{consigneeMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select product.image_url as itemImageUrl, product_order.status as orderStatus, product_order.product_name as itemName, product_order.amount as orderAmount, product_order.product_quantity as itemQuantity, product_order.consignee_name as consigneeName from product_order, product where product.id = product_order.product_id and product_order.user_id = 1
